field.name: summary
field.value: source code package does not build

field.name: description
field.value:
I downloaded the source code from the castleproject site. When running the build (nant /f:default.build -D:sign=false) file many errors occur: Not having a key gived a problem with InternalsVisibleTo("DynamicAssemblyProxyGen, ")
Also DynamicProxy2 is completely missing etc..etc.
I think I should be able to build the downloaded software without connection to the source repository or am I missing the point
